entry.title: Jul 25 2020
entry.summary: Using the following command in terminal, you can set sound level as you wish: pactl -- set-sink-volume 0 150% In this case we have set the volume of the sink #0 to 150%. ref: https://askubuntu.com/questions/322486/increase-sound-level
entry.content:
Using the following command in terminal, you can set sound level as you wish:

pactl -- set-sink-volume 0 150%

In this case we have set the volume of the sink #0 to 150%.
ref: https://askubuntu.com/questions/322486/increase-sound-level

entry.title: Nov 18 2019
entry.summary: Pixlr - Online Image Editing * 80,000 hours - Career advice, and effective altruism Sapienship - Yuval Noah Harari's Sapiens' associated foundation ZettleKasten - ZettleKasten note-taking, info organizing, giant method Roam Research - a Zettle type method of info organisation; paid Richardson Extrapolation - Numerical analysis method to accelerate convergence. Barrier - Open Source, free Synergy equivalent. software KVM Ethical Ads - Ethical Ads. Mainly focused on developers.
entry.content:
